detail_desc: Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, button placket and chest pocket. Gathered yoke at the back, gathered shoulder seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Thin Alice band in metal with pearly beads.
Fine-knit polo shirt in a silk and cotton blend with a button placket and ribbing at the collar, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft fine knit decorated with metal studs at the front of the neckline and across the front. Ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Straight-cut coat in an Italian wool blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Wide raglan sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs, welt front pockets and an inner pocket with a button. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, waffle-knit cotton with a small appliqué at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with long, raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dungarees in washed, stretch twill with buttons at the top and adjustable straps with a press-stud fastening. Side pockets, back pockets and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in slub cotton jersey with decorative flounces at the top.
Short-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Elasticated satin scrunchie with a scarf detail.

Ski gloves in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with folded seams, reinforced palm sections and reflective details. Elastication and an adjustable tab and plastic fastener at the wrists and soft inner ribbing at the top. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Thinsulate™ lining. The gloves have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
5-pocket trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button (press-stud for sizes 2-8Y). Regular fit.
Coat in a woven wool blend with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Decorative buttons at the cuffs, welt front pockets with a flap, and a single back vent. Lined.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft viscose jersey with a deep neckline at the back, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs.
Hooded top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with press-studs at the top, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft, lightly brushed inside.
Scarf in a soft cable knit with fringes on the short sides. Size 28x180 cm.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather and imitation suede details, a lightly padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Sports shorts in sturdy jersey with taped details, an elasticated drawstring waist and zipped side pockets.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short 5-pocket skirt in stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, and plastic beads and studs all over the front.
Knee-length nursing dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and wrapover top with a sewn-in inner top for easier nursing access. Short, wide sleeves and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Jacket in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a pile-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, front pockets, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with adjustable straps that fasten at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fully lined swimsuit with lightly padded cups, concealed elastication under the bust and a low-cut back.
Scarf in a patterned weave.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jersey top in soft, slub weave cotton with long sleeves, a press-stud on one shoulder and a decorative bow at the neck.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets, and flared legs.
Cropped cardigan knitted in a soft cotton blend with a deep V-neck, large buttons down the front and wide sleeves with close-fitting, ribbed cuffs.
Fitted jacket in a textured cotton and viscose weave with notch lapels, long sleeves, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. No fasteners. Lined.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a hook and eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and tapered legs with creases.

Long parka in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Jersey lining.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Bell-shaped skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist. Unlined.
Ribbed cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wide waistband containing a key pocket.
Joggers in soft cotton corduroy in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Wrapover bikini top with removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and wide ties at the back. Lined.
Thin tights with an elasticated waist.

Short, straight-cut dress in washed, lightweight denim with a round neckline, small opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with a flounced trim. Embroidered, scalloped edges around the sleeves and hem. Unlined.
Short kimono in satin with a lace yoke, wide 3/4-length sleeves with a lace trim and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Shorts in a viscose and linen slub weave with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and fake fly. Zipped side pockets, one welt back pocket, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Short top in a fine, textured knit with a deep V-neck, drawstring down the front and long trumpet sleeves.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly and skinny legs.
Briefs in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Pull-on trousers in soft twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly with decorative buttons, and leg pockets.
Jersey top with elastication at the top and short, wide, raglan sleeves with broderie anglaise.
Large, block-coloured scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and narrow hems.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Short, sleeveless top in soft, ribbed jersey with a visible seam down the front and decorative knot detail with a gentle draped effect at the hem.
Slightly shorter top in patterned jersey with gently dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
String shopper made of paper straw with two handles. Unlined. Depth 17.5 cm. Width 50 cm. Height 43 cm.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Short pyjama shorts in a soft cotton weave with an elasticated waist and frill trim at the hems. One pair with a satin drawstring.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Slippers in a jacquard weave made from recycled polyester containing glittery threads with a large bow on the top. Insoles and soles made from BLOOM™ algae foam. BLOOM™ is a foam made partly from algae biomass. This high-performing material has been used in the production of the soles of these slippers. The innovative manufacturing process used for this material helps to clean and restore the environment.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a V-neck and button placket. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved dress in soft jersey with a seam and drawstring at the waist.
Short dress in sturdy, patterned jersey with 3/4-length sleeves, a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a deep V-neck, seam centre front, gathers at the shoulders and short cap sleeves.
Sleeveless dress in tulle with sequined embroidery and glitter. Concealed zip at the back, narrow, elastic shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a layered tulle skirt. Lined.
Captain’s cap in a herringbone cotton weave with a peak, twisted cord at the front and buttons at the sides. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with hole-knit details. No buttons.
Short-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a wide neckline, elastication at the top and decorative buttons at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flounce at the hem.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline and short butterfly sleeves with overlocked hems.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim, straight legs.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped chest pocket, pockets in the side seams, an inner pocket with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Calf-length skirt in soft, rib-knit cashmere and organic cotton with a wide, elasticated ribbed waistband and a slit in one side.
Hat in a rib-knit wool blend with a turned-up hem.

Trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and front and back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with covered elastication at the waist. Lined.
